casebody.data:
In re the FORECLOSURE BY ROGERS TOWNSEND & THOMAS, PC, et al. No. 276PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2016. Renner Jo St. John, Attorney at Law, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. Gregory M. Katzman, Wilmington, Attorney at Law, for Beasley, Julia Weskett. Joseph S. Dowdy, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. Donald Richard Pocock, Attorney at Law, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. D. Martin Wart, Attorney at Law, for Holder VF-1, Inc., et al. W. Cory Reiss, Wilmington, Attorney at Law, for Beasley, Julia Weskett.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of May 2016 by Respondent-Appellant for Leave to File Addendum to New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2016."
